mapper.select: select group_concat(reced_id) as ids, `level` from sys_user_level where rec_id = #{userId} group by level
select ifnull(sum(sc.amount),0) from sys_user_level sul join mdc_user_contract muc on sul.reced_id = muc.user_id join sys_contract sc on muc.contract_id = sc.id where rec_id = #{userId} and type = 1
select rec_id as recId from sys_user_level where reced_id = #{user_id} order by level asc
